text:
Hey guys!
Was just trying this XML Database out for possible future use.

I was tinkering with the command line tools and command when I encountered this 
problem:

My document(s) were of the following format:

<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<product id="101">
	<name>Ozone</name>
	<type>Disinfectant</type>
</product>

I added this document and one other of the same tags (using add_document).  
Later I cannot query them using XPath (e.g. //product[@id='101']).

Good thing I used an index for reference.  
When I ran xindice rd -c /db/test -n 101
and got this back:
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<id product="101">
	<name>Ozone</name>
	<type>Disinfectant</type>
</id>

Was there something wrong with the usage of numbers as reference (index)?
If this has been fixed in the upcoming version, then ignore this message.

Thank you.
creator: rndj@ics.uplb.edu.ph
